entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Nordegg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
